column4: PLEASE RESPOND: why cant i check off the updates in the update manager.. some will update.. but theres about 20 that will not update (they just sit there and i cant chcke them off)
have you tried updating from the cli
whats cli??
if you open a terminal and type sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade see if that helps
cli stands for command line interface
what program are you using?
totem, and vlc
have you checked the preferences and seen what sound engine they are using?
can you hear other sounds?

yeah it starts playing the sound.. then shows the visualizer, then comes up with a window saying that it cant find the codec... then it says "search for codec". so i click search, and then its says there are non
you can try the medibuntu repo
how do you do that??
go to www.medibuntu.org I think it is and just copy and paste the code there in a terminal
then type sudo apt-get install non-free-codec
haveyou install the ubuntu-restricted-extras?
yes i have
what version on ubuntu you running? 8.10 or 8.04?
8.10 .. and sudo apt-get install non-free-codec doesnt work
type that after you get the medibuntu repo
does it show your sound card?
im totally lost.. im failry new to linux still
